attributes.action: Remove all  CONSENT implied or presumed by parliament in regards to brexit Bill.
attributes.additional_details: Parliamentarians think they can ride ruff shod over the will of the British people. Acting like Mafia. You need our CONSENT. Voting for liars is not consent..do you understand! Your a discrace & your actions are treasonous & dishonest. This petition  removes any CONSENT implied or otherwise for anything other than TOTAL withdrawal from the EU without payment of any kind. Furthermore, we hence forth only recognise English Law inline & not in conflict with our existing Constitution.. Finchley Rd.
attributes.background: We voted for a full & total detachment from the EU. We do not CONSENT & hereby remove all/any consent assumed or otherwise to any of the following: any money being paid to the EU what so ever. Adoption of ANY EU legislation into English Law contravening our Constitution. Giving away  fishing rights.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the UK to leave the EU immediately without a deal, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200165
